review_data.title: Great restaurant in Zurich
review_data.content: Service was great. Loved the Shakshuka. Im definetly returning on my next visit to Zurich. I recommend this to anyone who likes good food.

review_data.title: Wow! Bestes Restaurant in Zürich!
review_data.content: Einfach fantastisch! Super bedienung und gute Stimmung! Ich habe es wirklich genossen und kann es nur weiter empfehlen! Nach jeglichen...More

review_data.title: Charming Place
review_data.content: Food was delicious. Bob, the waiter, was very kind and has a lage selection of wines to offer. The place can easily be reached by tram, and is only located about 5min from the city center. I'm definitely visiting again!

review_data.title: Very good carbonara.
review_data.content: The meal was delicious, truly one of the best I've had in Zurich. Everything is home made, even the bread. The chef cook Charles clearly spent many years practicing his impressive skills. The atmosphere is very homey, and the staff is extremely friendly. Vongole's Kitchen...More
